question: Why Crude oil was exported from India in 1985?
option2: Alternative source of energy has been developed in India
option3: Import of petroleum products was much cheaper in comparison to the refined oil in India
option4: Due to insufficient refining capacity in India
answer: Due to insufficient refining capacity in India
explanation: Back in 1985 India didnâ€™t have sufficient refining capacity because there were less oil refineries that is why crude oil was exported from India in 1985.
